identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a clean, thumb-friendly mobile CRM for field sales reps.
principles: Mobile First: All touch targets > 44px. Bottom navigation for primary actions.
Clarity over Decoration: Data legibility is paramount.
One-Handed Use: Key interactions within thumb reach.
Turkish Context: Localized dates, currency, and terminology.

primary.name: Royal Azure
primary.description: Primary action color. Used for buttons, active states, and key highlights.

layout.structure: Mobile-first stack layout. Max-width container (md:max-w-md) centered on desktop for mobile simulation.

navigation.style: Fixed bottom, glassmorphism effect (backdrop-blur-lg bg-white/90), border-t border-slate-100

header.style: Minimalist. Large page title left-aligned. Date/Subtitle below.

CustomerCard.style: bg-white p-4 rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm flex items-center justify-between active:scale-[0.98] transition-transform
elements: Left: Status Indicator (w-1.5 h-full absolute left-0 rounded-l-xl)

PrimaryButton.style: w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium py-3 rounded-full shadow-lg shadow-blue-600/20 active:scale-95 transition-all

Input.style: h-12 bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-blue-500/20 rounded-lg

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Theme: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Royal Azure' primary color and 'Manrope' font family.
3. Layout: Create a 'MobileLayout' wrapper component that handles the max-width and bottom navigation.
4. Components: Build 'CustomerCard' and 'VisitStatusBadge' first as they are core to the UI.
5. Data: Create a mock data store (customers.json) with Turkish names and regions.
6. Routing: Use React Router for navigation between Home, Detail, and List views.
7. Localization: Ensure all hardcoded text is in Turkish. Use 'date-fns' for date formatting.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use generous padding (p-6) inside cards.
Do not use gradients for the main background; keep it clean slate-50.
Ensure text contrast is high (Slate-900 for headings, Slate-500 for muted).
Add 'active:scale-95' to all interactive elements for tactile mobile feel.
